You will assess security controls, manage compliance documentation, and support audit activities to safeguard payment card data. Expectation of 3-days in the office and as confirmed by your Hiring Manager.Key Requirements Tertiary qualification in business or technology and/or relevant experience Experience with PowerBI (Desktop, Service, Power Query, DAX) Experience in dashboard/report building Experience in analysing large datasets and identifying insights for stakeholders Data scanning and pattern recognition capabilities Strong Excel and Microsoft Office skills Well-developed interpersonal skills with demonstrated ability to communicate effectively with both business and technology stakeholders Well organised, excellent time management skills, self-managing Ability to work in a highly regulated, fast-paced environment.Desirable: Knowledge of PCI DSS obligations Experience using Microsoft SQL to write and run queries Understanding of data exchange pointsWhy this is important to VisaThis role will support a strategic and multi-dimensional client in New Zealand as a member of a growing team at Visa. This role ensures the delivery of safe, secure payments by developing robust compliance plans. It builds customer trust and protects the organization from financial loss due to non-compliance.Projects you will be a part of:The role will ideally be based in Auckland or Wellington in a hybrid work environment (minimum 3 days in office per week).
